abstract: Israeli border police shoot two Palestinians who stabbed two Israeli Jews near entrance to Jerusalem's Old City; one Palestinian assailant and one of the Israeli victims die from their wounds, along with Israeli bystander caught in police gunfire; violence is part of recent wave stemming from dispute over Al Aqsa Mosque complex.
lead_paragraph: The two assailants died after being shot by the police, and a third Israeli civilian died hours later, apparently after he was hit by police fire, the police said.

headline.main: Two Israeli Jews Stabbed, One Fatally, by Two Palestinians in Jerusalem
headline.print_headline: Two Israelis Are Stabbed, One Fatally, in Jerusalem

snippet: The two assailants died after being shot by the police, and a third Israeli civilian died hours later, apparently after he was hit by police fire, the police said.
